reviews.text: Thoroughly enjoyed a business stay at this hotel, primarily due to the staff. Every member of the staff we met, from the room service staff to the front desk was friendly, accomodating and eager to offer assistance or advice.
reviews.title: Wonderful Staff Make this Hotel

reviews.text: We stayed in one of the suites which had a balcony and tremendous view of the mountains. The suite was quite spacious and included high speed internet. Furnishings were not up to the quality of a five star hotel. The bathroom was small, but well appointed and a second sink was provided in the dressing area.
reviews.title: Nice place, but watch out for the shower!
